dynamic-element.name: careers_description
dynamic-element.dynamic-content:
Liferay is seeking an aggressive, high-energy software sales professional capable of identifying and closing enterprise software sales opportunities, both through partners and direct sales.

This position reports to the Liferay Japan President and Representative Director.

dynamic-element.name: careers_attribute_heading
career_attribute
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: Build and manage a sales pipeline with the goal of meeting and exceeding assigned sales quota.

dynamic-element.name: career_attribute
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: “Hands-on” development of new sales opportunities through cold-calling, lead follow up, and partner, channel and personal relationships.

dynamic-element.name: career_attribute
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: Recruit and manage reselling partners. Train and the mentor them on selling Liferay, and help them drive sales opportunities to contract closure.

dynamic-element.name: career_attribute
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: Drive direct-sales opportunities to closure, and establish strong, long-lasting relationships which will yield on-going successes in accounts.

dynamic-element.name: career_attribute
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: Work with other members of Liferay’s global sales organization on multi-national sales opportunities.

dynamic-element.name: career_attribute
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: Work as a team player. Candidate must be able to work effectively with Liferay Japan team members, and “wear multiple hats” when it becomes necessary.

dynamic-element.name: career_attribute
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: Travel within assigned territory is required.
Major Objectives

dynamic-element.name: careers_attribute_heading
career_attribute
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: Japanese native, or capable of speaking Japanese at a native level, with a clear understanding of the Japanese business culture.

dynamic-element.name: career_attribute
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: At least 10 years experience in software sales with responsibility for meeting an individual sales quota. Can be in the capacity of a reseller or vendor.

dynamic-element.name: career_attribute
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: A proven track record of successfully selling enterprise-level software solution sales (e.g. Content Management, ERP, CRM, eBusiness and/or eCommerce applications), both in a direct and indirect selling model.

dynamic-element.name: career_attribute
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: Demonstrated ability to execute each phase of the sales cycle, from lead generation (cold calling, leveraging of channels and contacts, to lead qualification and sales close.

dynamic-element.name: career_attribute
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: Experience in managing Japanese systems integration providers who provide selling, service, and support for products.

dynamic-element.name: career_attribute
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: Experience in closing large software deals.

dynamic-element.name: career_attribute
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: Excellent presentation skills to executives & individual contributors.

dynamic-element.name: career_attribute
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

dynamic-element.name: career_attribute
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: English fluency.
